{"id":472239427,"question_id":44,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"3 years, 11 months","timestamp":1616665245,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"936 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/472239427/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"124 MB","code":"from collections import defaultdict\nclass Solution:\n    def isMatch(self, s: str, p: str) -> bool:\n        \n        count = [0]* len(p)\n        if p and p[-1] == '*':\n            count[-1] = 1 \n        for i in range(len(p)-2, -1, -1):\n            temp = 0\n            if p[i] == '*':\n                temp = 1\n            count[i] += count[i+1] + temp\n        memo = defaultdict(bool)\n        def helper(si, pi):\n            if (si, pi) in memo:\n                return memo[(si,pi)]\n            nonlocal s, p, count\n\n            if si == len(s) and pi == len(p):\n                memo[(si,pi)] = True\n                return True\n            if si != len(s) and pi == len(p):\n                memo[(si,pi)] = False\n                return False\n            if pi != len(p) and si == len(s):\n                if len(p) - pi == count[pi]:\n                    memo[(si,pi)] = True\n                    return True\n                memo[(si,pi)] = False\n                return False\n\n            if si < len(s) and pi < len(p):\n                \n                if p[pi] == '?':\n                    memo[(si,pi)] = helper(si+1, pi+1)\n                    return memo[(si,pi)]\n                elif p[pi] != '*':\n                    memo[(si,pi)] = p[pi] == s[si] and helper(si+1, pi+1)\n                    return memo[(si,pi)]\n                else: \n                    memo[(si,pi)] = helper(si, pi+1) or helper(si+1, pi)\n                    return memo[(si,pi)]\n            \n        return helper(0, 0)\n            \n\n    \n      \n'''\n'?' : character\n'*' : sequence\n\n\n\ns = \"acdcb\", p = \"a*c?b\"\n\n  a c d c b\na 1 \n* \nc\n?\nb\n'''","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
